segments.text: Can I help you sir?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yes you can help me.  Where is my luggage?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well, let me just check on that for you.  Where are you coming--?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.  You do that.  I'm coming from Baltimore.  You know where that is?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir, yes it's in Maryland.  It's okay...well, I'm...just let me check here.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I had eight hundred pounds of luggage.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Okay.  Sir?  Can you...if you just give me one moment and let me just check okay?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Okay.  Check.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Alright.  And you're coming-- Wait, hold on sir.  You're coming from Baltimore into LAX right?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Is it there?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Okay and this is direct flight?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: You don't know where we're at?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: God.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I'm asking you if this is direct flight from Baltimore to LAX or if you have to stop--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: You know I've been waiting here for four hours for my luggage
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: and it's not here, they told me to go to this person, go to this person.  Now I'm at this person.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You're at me and I'm going to try to help you out sir but you just have to cooperate with me--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Okay.  What do you want?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: How many pieces of luggage do you have checked in?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Eight.  And they're all gone.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Eight pieces of luggage.  Okay.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: And what are you going to do about it?  You going to call someone?  You going to send me somewhere else?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No.  I'm just going to check--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It's my mother's funeral tomorrow and the urn is in the suitcase.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I'm sorry sir.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I'm very sorry but let's check on this immediately.  This is definitely an emergency.  It seems--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What am I going to do tomorrow without the urn?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir it seems to me that your luggage is um- is not here
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh, oh, that's a good deduction.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yes--it is
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Sherlock Holmes.  God, where's my luggage?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir, Please please, I would ask you to just calm down for a second--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Calm down?  It's my mother's funeral tomorrow.  I'm the one responsible for this.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Okay.  We will find your luggage.  Apparently because it somehow...what flight you were taking, you were on Delta?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yes.  You are a Delta representative.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yes, I am.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What is the matter with you?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir, I just...you need to calm down is what needs to happen right now.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Don't yell at me.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Okay.  I'm not.  I'm sorry, I am being--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: calm.  Sir, okay basically what- what's going to happen here is you're going to give me your contact information and we will contact you--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh my God.  I think a blood vessel burst in my head.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Please, please
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: sir, listen to me.  Your luggage is still in Baltimore.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Okay.  We can get it here in about seven to ten business days.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What?  Are you kidding me?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yes.  Well, because--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Give- Give me your manager right now.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I am the manager sir.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: You're the manager? You don't know where you work for, you don't know where you're at and you're the manager?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir I know where I work for but I was checking because you cannot--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Whose daughter are you?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Sir. Sir. Sir. Sir
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: What is your name?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: My name is Brent Caption.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Now what are you going to do about it?
segments.speaker: M
